data.text: @manairport So itâ€™s personal choice, Thankyou for getting back to me on this
@scottmurray43 Hi Scott. We strongly recommend the wearing of face coverings in all areas of our airport. Thank you.
@manairport You're wording this as if it is the right thing to do. You should be impartial by not even tweeting about it. I hope people don't #WearAMask.

@manairport I understand face coverings are still mandatory on airplanes for now. But is it now a personal choice on whether you wear one when walking around the airport. Please can you advise as the rules have been changing so much.

@manairport Again. this is NOT public health guidance and it is not IPC best practice. You can 'request' all you like but have no right or authority to strongly recommend anything. Remember when you went overboard and demanded gloves? 😂 Airlines need to remove their own mandates too.
